name: Top Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet
tooltip:
Top Piece of Lord Valthalak's Amulet
Item Level 1
Quest Item
Unique
Use: Recombines the left, right and top pieces of Lord Valthalak's Amulet into one whole.
"This object feels wrong to the touch, as if an evil within is trying to escape."
Dropped by: Theldren
Drop Chance: 69.74%
